attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, respect the right that, in a diplomatic society, one is free to believe whatever they wish, and to hold whatever points of view fit with those beliefs.
However, it has emerged that Nick Griffin, MEP for the Northwest, allegedly used the Twitter social network to arrange a protest outside the home of two openly gay men.
We believe that this is an abuse of the office he holds and that he and his party should be removed from the UK political system, regardless of the result of any police investigation.
